title: SavedQueryCreated
description: Recorded when a Data Analyst saves a composed SQL statement with a name and dataset reference.

savedQueryId.description: Unique identifier for the saved query

ownerId.description: User ID of the query owner

name.description: Display name for the saved query

datasetRef.description: Reference to the target dataset decomposed into catalog and dataset components

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the query was saved
